Blog.post: >> oh who the hell am i kidding there is no way i can deviate from my usual theme. i just had to tell my friend what papi chulo meant and now i dont even know if he is. but luckily from what he told me my theory holds up until it is proven other wise to me that it is not true, then it is. so i dunno whats gonna happen to me in my life all in all. there are things that i want to happen or maybe. as i told u my friends say i have a tell. i believe it is true but i dunno. i just wish that i wasnt so deperate to find a girlfriend...well not so much desperate as well i just want one. that i let the littlest thing effect me so greatly. oh well i will just hafta figure this out on my own whatever >>

>> hmmm. what to write about now. i dont really wanna follow the same theme, because, well, i just dont wanna. though i still feel that way i just dont feel like talkin about it because it is gettin kinda monotonous and i dont feel it is neccesary. well anyway i hafta write this econ paper. its might be hard but it might not so whatever. i almost fucked up. Man it was close but anyway i better get to work so >>

>> another day another dollar , have u ever really thought about that what does it really mean anyway , yes it means u earn money every day if u have a job but what if u dont , i was tryin to go to bet but i couldnt because i was thinkin just thinkin about every thing and this just popped into my head no explaination it just was there and i couldnt figure it out , and another was that my friend is a total papi chulo, and all i can say is good for him i mean...(he'll get it) and y cant i be like that i have said this to several people and only a few of them can fill in the blanks, maybe i'll find the nicest prettiest girl ... out. i always follow that with naaaaaaaa,, because it is not gonna happen, i dont feel really sad i am just kind well i am really not anything but any way it isnt gonna happen because that is just the way the world works i wish it didnt but whatever that's life IT'S ALL GOLDEN as i always say and that usually holds up except when i really rip into myself about how much i suck (vito abe khem u can back me up on that, that i do that often) anyway life is like a fucked up box of chocolates u never fuckin know what u r gonna get >>

>> life is really strange. i cant for the life of me figure anything out but the phrase "shit happens" seems to categorize pretty much everything. my life is confusing and i gotta friend who want to go "cruisin on down main street" but he is afraid. now if u know me and know how fucked up i am or have just stumbled on this blog and have realized how fucked up i am damn if forgot where i was going with that. but anyway abe was tryin to set me up with sheila which i didnt think was gonna happen and it didnt but who the fuck cares i mean IT'S ALL GOLDEN and if u have read this that is sorta my motto and another thing my friends say that i have a tell whenever i like a girl. apparently i talk about them a lot but i dunno so what ever. >>

>> well yesterday was both a strange and very confusing day. i was very happy that i was on my way to completely getting over claudie (which i talked about 2 posts ago) anyway i was talkin to vito and he kept asking me if i liked giselle and i kept asking him y the fuck he was asking me it was getting very annoying anyway i got totally flustered and said i dunno. but in reality i do like her IN A STRICTLY PLATONIC WAY and i kept telling him that but he kept bitching because i had said i dunno. then abe IM-ed and asked me the same goddamn now this i couldnt figure out unless they had been talkin y would they think the same question abe said the reason was because it seemed like i did and even giselle doesnt think that and unless she is lying to me i dunno whatever fuck it >>

>> khem u r a dumbass son of a bitch. i just read your blog and the fact that i have no chance with sheila or claudie is a given. and what the fuck r u talkin about man u have never seen her and dont know who she is and that bottle of lotion shit u can go to hell u bastard in case u havent noticed u dont have a girlfriend either so u can shut the fuck up >>

>> now as u know yesterday i was absolutely pissed and i told u the reason was because i still had feelings for claudie now yesterday this was true because it just was now as u know i was infatuated with claudie even after i said i was over her and i figured out the reason for this after i realized it was unhealthy i basically forced myself to get rid of my feelings for her. but as i went to sleep yesterday i had no clue what to do now today i was strangely calm and i know the reason y this time it happened naturally and i believe that it really did. i think that getting my feelings for her all out in the open may have helped me get over her. now i still think she is pretty but i have accepted that nothing will ever happen because she doesnt like and wants to get with cisco now as i also told u abe is trying to set me up with sheila and i doubt that will happen because she wants to get with cisco to but u never know maybe we will get together maybe now i have also realized that there is someone out there for me and it is not claudie i have no idea who it is but she will eventually come along >>
>> GODDAMNIT >>

>> well back to the blog with a kinda new problem. now a few months ago my friend khem was an asshole and was online with this ugly-ass bitch chelsea pretending to be me. so chelsea thought i liked her. now i sure as shit dont and i told her that. but she kept bugging me on AIM so i blocked her ass. then her friend talia started buggin me. and just today she told me that chelsea says high. now i dont give a shit if she says hi. i then i told her that i didnt like chelsea. then...she said that the hi was retracted and that i was an ungrateful person. now this bitch obviously doesnt know me that well i am because i am usually one of the nicest and most gratious people in the in the world. then i said "fuck u" and then i blocked her. no they can both go to hell because i am really pissed at both of them and i dont even fuckin know them >>

>> It's all golden I say that all the time but what does it really mean. It means that everything that happens is the best thing to happen in the situation or it means that everything is all good and there are no problems. Now it may not seem like it is the best thing to happen at the time but in time everything reveals itself and everything eventually works out. Now there is no telling when it will show it self but a person must be patient. Unfortunately that is one thing that I am usually not. I mean I usually want things to happen now and not have to wait. Like I want the school year to end now. And I want a girlfriend now but unfortunately neither of those things are gone happen anytime soon >>

>> goddamn it i just cant get this thought out of my head. as i have said in just about every fuckin post i have well posted. i need to find a girl who would like me now in my mind i think that that would be a problem. and this in and of itself is a problem i may not be able to find a girl because i have like the lowest fuckin self-esteem of anyone in the world. i mean when my friends say i should go up to a girl which is not that often i say "naw man u and i both know that there is no way that she would like me" now this is the problem i just dont think that any self respecting, good looking girl would go out with me so well i dunno but whatever >>

>> y the fuck cant my life make more sense. dont know what the fuck is goin on around me and how i can make it understandable. i dont know who likes me and i dont know who hates me. i mean shit this has to be the most confusing year of my life. and the thing is i make it like that. i cant figure out y i over analyze things and let them get under my skin. i just need to calm down and forget that ___________ happened i put the ____ because this is a universal sentence that i can apply to many different situations >>

>> well i have a little bit of good news. that girl claudie that i spoke of in my last blog. well for some reason i couldnt get over her even though we never had anything together. well this infatuation was not healthy plus i found out that she now likes someone who i would have no fuckin chance in hell of competing with. anyway i made a promise to my self that by the time i woke up yesterday i would be completely over her. well i'll be damned if it didnt work. i couldnt care less if she liked me. IT'S ALL GOLDEN well i feel that no matter what happens in my life it will all turn out ok plus no matter what my friends say to me i just dont give a flyin fuck anymore >>

>> well let me start off by saying that i am not successful in anything. especially, my success with girls. i am a junior in high school and yesterday was our junior prom. i went with this freshman that i really like. at least i think that i like her. anyway she doesnt like me she likes some other guy. it wouldn't have been as big of a problem had my friends not totally convinced me that she liked me. now i wanted to dance with her as much as i could. she always went to the bathroom and danced with our friends khem and big jack. now i know that i am not that good of a dancer but i tried. anyway later last night we went over to my friend eli's girlfriends house. there eli told me that claudie was feeling some way because she thought that i was being unfriendly and trying to avoid. now this is the exact opposite of what i was trying to do. i really wanted to get to know her better so that maybe she would like me. when i asked her she said she wasn't and later eli said that she had told. so i'm so fuckin confused well it was good to just get all of that out in the open >>
>> yeah i just started this blog and don't quite know what i am gonna write right now >>
>> well no new news right now. i hope there will be soon but unfortunately i cant predict the future. u probably know what i am talkin about >>
>> Look up at the sky shit's going down I heard a bang and stars collided >>

>> I dunno what to write now but I felt I should post. things are good right now, except for the obvious problems. but I have had those problems for awhile. well I cant wait till college. things r gonna be different. I will be confident and assertive. and hopefully I will have better luck. this summer is gonna be good. I am workin this summer and I will be goin on a summer service project. that should be fun. well thats it. >>

>> OOMPA LOOMPA DOOMPADEE DOO I'VE GOT A PERFECT PUZZLE FOR YOU OOMPA LOOMPA, DOOMPADAH DEE IF YOU ARE WISE YOU'LL LISTEN ME WHAT DO YOU GET WHEN YOU GUZZLE DOWN SWEETS EATING AS MUCH AS AN ELEPHANT EATS WHAT ARE YOU AT GETTING TERRIBLY FAT WHAT DO YOU THINK WILL COME OF THAT I DON'T LIKE THE LOOK OF IT OOMPA LOOMPA DOOMPADEE DAH IF YOU'RE NOT GREEDY YOU WILL GO FAR YOU WILL LIVE IN HAPPINESS TOO LIKE THE OOMPA LOOMPA DOOMPADEE DO DOOMPADEE DOO >>

>> I dunno what I am gonna do now. I guess it is back to square one. no girlfriend. its cool. I really like giselle but i guess she didnt feel the same way. I dont feel all that bad I guess it wasnt supposed to happen. well I guess it is back to the "hunt" so to speak. and what an unlucky hunt it has been. hahahahahaha. oh well whatever >>
>> well giselle said she never wants to go out with me. it sucks but whatever, I expected as much. I mean come on. me and her, yeah right. >>

>> well the school year is comin to an end and next year I will be a senior. WOOOOOO. I am with giselle now and it is awesome. we were gonna go out today but as I said in my last post she is on lockdown. so right now I am really bored because nobody is online. I am watchin tv but I am still bored. I should probably do some hw. but anyway things rock >>>

>> well it sucks I cant go out with giselle today. she is in big trouble with her parents for her grades so she cant talk online or on the phone. but whatever it sucks but it isnt a big deal we will just go out next weekend(unless she is still in trouble). so whatever its all golden >>

>> i am really happy except for one thing. and that thing is jack. not vito but big jack. vito is cool with it. but big jack is still bein a dumbass motherfucker and it is pissin me off. he keeps callin me a slut and giselle a ho and as i said that is pissin me off. why the fuck cant he just accept it. shit i dont even know y he is bein such an asshole, i mean none of this stuff affects him, and he is the only one who cares. and it is still ALL GOLDEN >>
>> kick ass shit yo. i am with giselle now and whats more vito is happy for us. i get to have the girl and my friend. whatever i am out. late >>

>> well well well i feel a lot better. i asked giselle out yesterday and she said yes. now vito who had been sayin i could for many a time, and when i asked if he was serious he was like of course, he got pretty pissed. than he changed his tone like 3 times last nite. he says i am a backstabber and i admit what i did was a little cold but i dont regret it and am glad i did it. then he starts talkin about some bad karma bullshit and i am like whatever and then i blocked him. i am happy for what has happened and if i could do it again i think i would >>

>> my friend abe tries to help me but most of the time ihas just blown up. first he tried to set me up with giselle KABOOM but that was my fault. then he was like "u should ask claudie to prom"KABOOM. hey i can set u up with sheila KABOOM >>

>> i am so alone. i feel that i will be alone for the rest of my life. but in reality i i dont know what my future holds. i know what i want it to hold but who the hell knows. life is some crazy shit. things be goin on that i wish werent but there is nothin i can do and they r probably happening as i speak. i can only control myself. i cant tell other people what to do. people have to make their own decisions and mistakes. who knows how everything is gonna work out. i wish i knew but i dont. >>
>> To jest całym złotym >>

>> i dunno what i am gonna do with my life. i mean there r things that i want but know i cant have. i will just have to figure things out. hopefully everything will work out for everyone. i dunno. things are gonna be alright. potrzebuję koleżanki if u dont know what that means dont worry about it. all i know is nothing >>
>> i dunno what to do. i am a nice guy and nice guys finish last. but yesterday someone told me that when a nice guy knows he can finish first he always does. >>

>> well life is gettin kinda weird. Well Vito is movin away and I am gonna miss him. He is one of my best friends and as odd as this may seem I have never had a friend move away before. Abe is tryin to get with Maria and good luck with that buddy. Yesterday I was told that Claudie hated me. I could understand y that would be because well thats not important. However when I asked Claudie y she hate me she said she didnt. Now I am totally confused. Another thing that confused me was that she said I was good looking. She didnt say this as if she wanted to go out with me but that didnt matter. The thing was I would like to think she is telling me the truth but no one has ever said that to me in my entire life. Shit not even me. I hope she doesnt hate me because I want to stay friends. Now to get to my recurring theme. Well I am a nice guy and nice guys finish last. I think that this is bogus but it seems to be true. I went out with Sarah that blew up. I asked Liz out that blew up. I liked Claudie she didnt like me. Abe tried to set me up with Sheila that didnt work. Well thats pretty much all I have to say >>

>> I havent posted in a while and i am very pissed right now. some of u know what it is. it is so frustrating. it is making me physically sick knowing that there is nothing i can do. there is probably something Z and P can do. Z is still tryin to figure out how. i was mainly pissed because i thought i was the only one who saw something wrong in what L was doin. But i found out today that Z and P care as well. Whats worse is that no matter what happens someone is gonna get hurt. and that is so depressing. this is too much goddamn pressure on my back. it is pushing me lower and lower and lower and lower untill eventually i cant get any lower and i just snap. now i dont know what snap means for all i know it will mean that i will get and ulcer. but who knows all i know is that this shit is tearin me up inside. whats worse R doesnt even know. this may not make sense to anyone but those who know what i am talkin about may perhaps understand. >>
>> i dunno what to do >>

>> well this kind of sucks. one of my best friends is pissed at me. two of my other friends are drunk off their ass and... well i dont think i can handle it anymore. my friends hate me. every girl in the world hates me. i dont know what to do. now i am not gonna do anything drastic like kill or cut myself. i just cant figure anything out. i was gonna go with my friends tonite but they decided to go and drink and smoke. i am not a square well maybe i am. but i am not just stupid enough to go and do that dumb shit, sadly this will perhaps be my downfall >>

>> well this is bullshit. the only reason i talk to giselle i because she is easy to talk to. not because i like her. u got that vito. i dont like her like that. now u say she doesnt wanna talk to me because she doesnt wanna mess up your relationship. and now i am thinkin what the fuck relationship r u talkin about. vito i would like to talk to her. now dont take this for anymore than face value. u got that vito. >>

>> AHHHHHHHHHH this is some totally bogus shit. i am so totally bummed. same reason no change in my demeanor. goddamn i am gonna say it again. i suck. well maybe i dont. i dunno. what is wrong with me. maybe nothin. i dunno. i hope its all gonna work out. but i dunno. this sucks man. my friends accuse me of shit. i dont need this crap right now. i got enough shit running through my head. its too much the hamster cant handle it. he is gonna die. i mean my friends try and help me but it doesnt usually work. u know how many times abe has said " lets go hit on chicks". shit thats not gonna work. anyone who knows me knows that that isnt how i do things. i have no self-esteem. u know how i got my first girlfriend sarah. she asked me to the dance and then we started goin out. iy wasnt me. and she turned out to be a bitch. and whats more is when we were goin out i was at her house and when she said lets go to my room i apparently said "why". whatever. life still sucks man i dont think anything will ever work out for me. at least not in the immediate future. i hope that everything works out for my friends especially abe. but whatever >>
>> Whatever >>

>> i am kinda depressed and it is for the usual reason. u guys can make fun of me for this but whatever. abe i was talkin to u about this yesterday. and good luck on your SAT. and i am happy for u... i dunno what is gonna happen in my life but it will all be golden. things might happen but then again it might not so whatever. >>

>> my life just keeps getting weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder and weirder >>
>> DUR DA DUR >>

>> Well I have been told something interesting today. Those who know what I am talking about will understand. I am not sure what I will do, but, well I just don't know. I think if I went for it I might make someone very close to me happy. But, well I just don't know >>

>> Well I have been told about 13 different things in the past week. You probably know what I am talking about. I know the way I feel and I don't think anything will change that. I know what I want and I don't think anything will change that. I just wish that I could understand the world. I was so hurt yesterday when Abe told me that it felt as though somebody had just punched me in the stomach. >>
>> My guts have been ripped out and thrown on the GODDAMN floor >>
>> There is something I must do >>

>> I just got back from my date with Keli. I am not gonna go into any details because ALL OF YOU ASSHOLES WERE THERE. You know, I expected better from my "friends". Oh khem way to throw pennies at us you have the worst aim ever. oh and abe I didnt do anything that stopped maria from coming. IT WAS HER FATHER. >>

>> Well yesterday I finally met Keli. It only took a month and a half. But it was well worth the wait. I had an awesome time. I just wish I had had more time. To Abe, Vito, or whoever the fuck else is putting that shit in people's chatters I have something to say. Why are we fighting? Is there really any reason? I mean we are all friends here and we dont need to act like children. So in short I am asking you to stop with all of the childish bullshit. Also to Abe I apologize for what I did on the phone last night. >>

>> vito- I know that you guys arent rooting against me BUT "is that when an atomic bomb will again fall on the polish nation" sure as shit doesnt seem like you arent. I read your blog vito and wow vito you are stupid "I can still make Dustin cry from the east coast" that is one of the biggest loads of crap I have ever read. abe-Dont pretend to be me in my chatter you dumbass. abe you are doing it again. Some of this shit you do is freaking Keli out. I dont know which one of you fuckers is writing all this shit in keli and maria's chatters but stop it. I know it is you because you are the only two fuckers in the world that say "whaa" so you guys can just go to fuckin hell

>> Well hello folks. I just got back from vacation and it wasnt that bad. I had going to Maria's block party and meeting Keli to look forward to. BUT Maria said the guys and I couldnt go because of her parents. Lucky for me, Keli and I talked and we figured it out. So I still have that to wait for. Unfortunately, I have to do "forced volunteerism". It wont be so bad, I have had to do it before so it will be no sweat. So after I do that it will be off to meet my destiny. Until next time... >>

>> Well I haven't posted in awhile so here is what it going on. About a week ago I told Keli how I really felt about her, and surprise surprise she still liked me. This got me really excited and I knew I had to meet her. I finally will on the 24th of July. Of course I am worried. I am worried that since we have been talking so much we wont have anything left to talk about, but Keli said I shouldn't be worried. Well I have to go now I will post eventually. >>

>> Well I am still with Keli and I am incredibly happy. She is in Wisconsin right now and wont be back until tomorrow afternoon. Abe left for Ohio a few days ago and Khem left yesterday or something. I probably wont see them until school starts again. Well I am gonna go out with Keli again on Saturday BUT I AM NOT TELLING YOU GUYS WHERE WE ARE GOING. Of course the masterminds of the whole Wednesday thing are no longer here. So until I post again. >>
